mapper.insert: insert into t_privileges (id, privileges_name, url, target, pid, icon, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, state, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilegesName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update t_privileges set privileges_name=#{privilegesName}, url=#{url}, target=#{target}, pid=#{pid}, icon=#{icon}, modifier=#{modifier}, modify_time=#{modifyTime}, state=#{state}, remark=#{remark} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, privileges_name, url, target, pid, icon, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, state, remark from t_privileges where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
